title: Show me English: the local council [episode 6]
creator_credit: Jeff Spencer, David Ferris, Trevor Lunn and Victoria. Ministry of Education
brief_description: A series of programmes which aim to help adult migrants communicate in everyday situations. A problem tree growing outside Tina’s home necessitates the involvement of the local council in reaching a satisfactory solution. Home tutor program by the Adult Migrant Information Service.
